snippet: Despite all its political drama, Romania has done nothing to tackle the entrenched clientelism and corruption that plagues its political process.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Romanian senator Mircea Geoana asserts Romania, despite all the political drama surrounding the ouster of Pres Traian Basescu, has done nothing to tackle the entrenched clientelism and corruption that plagues its political process.
lead_paragraph: Despite all its political drama, Romania has done nothing to tackle the entrenched clientelism and corruption that plagues its political process.

headline.seo: Bringing Romania Back From the Brink
headline.main: Bringing Romania Back From the Brink
headline.print_headline: Bringing Romania Back From the Brink
